Posts.Content: fatimaR wrote: my mother's annual mammogram showed a well defined rounded lobulated lesion 1cm with internal microcalcifications. biard 4 Nothing was found on ultrasound and she has stereotactic biopsy in two days. We are very anxious and worried. Her period just stopped for 6 months as she turned 53 Anyone had a similar findig a lesion with microcalcifications ? Log in to post a reply
